name: [GAME:VALID]
description:
TEMPURATURE IN CELSIUS. BABY NOT FREEZING.

Play the sequel at https://drunk-puppy.itch.io/invalid.

     Hi, there! Co-Creator of Drunkpuppy, Stygian Hero, bringing you the 1st (technically 2nd) game from Drunkpuppy Studios! In this game, you must save validity as a baby whose only power is some flippers that help it jump.

This game was created for the Valid Jam 2020-2021

Keep Gaming,  -Me

Or don't, I don't care
